title: Experience the Lifestyle.
posting_body: ['Lease TODAY!', 'Welcome to Manchester State Thomas', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 2 Bedroom + 1 Den, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1885 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Located in the coveted Uptown State Thomas Neighborhood of Dallas, Texas, Manchester State Thomas offers something for everyone: spacious Townhouses, historic architecture of the Brownstones, and the contemporary style of the City View Flats.', 'These luxury apartments in Uptown Dallas give you the elegant and refined lifestyle you desire.', "Experience the State Thomas neighborhood's fusion of modern convenience with the old-world charm of the vibrant, walkable, and pet-friendly apartments in Uptown Dallas.", 'Features:', 'cultured marble, vaulted ceilings, abundant closets*, soaking tubs, ceramic tile, ceiling fans, granite counter tops, quartz Countertops*, audible alarms, hardwood flooring, dual vanities/dual sinks, brazilian hardwoods*, crown molding, brownstones and townhomes, walk-in showers, built-in bookshelves & niches, kitchen islands, mahogany doors on street fronts, two-tone paint, wood burning fireplaces w/ stone hearths, built-in wine rack*, attached one & two car garages, ice makers & water filters, stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer connections', '*select apartment homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'controlled access gate, cobblestone streets, outdoor living area w/ grill stations, Uptown, pet friendly, 24-hour wellness lifestyle center, emergency 24-hour maintenance, swimming pool with sun deck, fire pit/lounge area, McKinney Avenue Trolley, landscaped courtyard, mature landscaping, cabana, attached garages, climate-controlled storage, convenient parking garage w/ elevators, courtyard & pool views, easy access to 75, 30, 35 and the Tollway, walkscore 85, Adjacent to Griggs park', '*amenities and features subject to change.', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your four legged friends!', '2 pets per apartment home, no weight restrictions.', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'lXA8MMJt8']
